extendedInfo.description: Remote access to what children are doing on the internet. What apps and games they play. And where they are by GPS monitoring. Now parents can control their children's online activity remotely from whenever they are.Care4teen is an application that will protect your child. Restrictions for launching applications, safe web browser. Parents can remotely see online real time reports at the care4teen.com website: what sites the child has visited and whom the child has communicated with. Thanks to the GPS monitoring, you will always know where your child is.With Care4teen, you will always be there, by your child's side.Features:- safe web browser- individual application blockRemote reports mean that you will be able to see all your child's mobile phone activities in your personal account at the care4teen.com website:- remote reports on the websites visited- remote reports on applications and games launched- remote reports on phone calls made- remote reports on SMS's sent and received- remote reports on your child's location

reviews.title: Scam!! Scam!! Scam!!
reviews.comment: Worthless. No support. can\'t do 95% of what\'s advertised and nowhere to go for instructions. Take your $ but then nothing! Don\'t buy!
reviews.author: Izzy Smith

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work as expected
reviews.comment: Adding apps to the blacklist does nothing.  They are supposed to be blocked, they are not.  After a short time I can run several apps on the device and they are not being reported as ever being run in the web-portal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just doesn\'t work, then PAY?
reviews.comment: Tried this app on two handsets for several weeks. Good IDEAS, just doesn\'t function. After trial it needs $7 per month. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Clint Spevak

reviews.title: Does not work.
reviews.comment: There also seems to be something funny about all those ratings.
reviews.author: Tommy B

reviews.title: Absolutly useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t use it as it doesn\'t integrate with the current browser. Don\'t recommend this for anyone.
reviews.author: Miracle Andrews

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Maybe its me. Maybe its my phone. The browser is awful. I could not access the parental control board.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its very cool
reviews.comment: I have two girls that drive me crazy. This is a great app for more control. I would give Five stars but it doesn\'t let me log in from my cel. Please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I would give zero star if I can
reviews.comment: It is complete waste of time. Could not register. Keep saying no internet but my browser works just fine. No support to answer my questions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Worst app I have ever downloaded. Talk about absloute CRAP! I mean come on, even a ratchet weave would have been better. :O
reviews.author: Cece Fischer

reviews.title: Galaxy Slll user
reviews.comment: This app started off just what I wanted, but then after a day or two started crashing and then causing issues with everything on my phone.  Do not recommend untill issues are resolved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It crashes pretty much everyday
reviews.comment: Need be more stable. Looks like beta and not ready for release yet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: How can i add more phones for more kids, I have two to monitor?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is a scam
reviews.comment: It shows that it has over 500 reviews but it only has less than ten real reviews. The app completely not working at all. I reported them to Google
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Farher
reviews.comment: The point is not to inform your teenager that you want to monitor their activities and not the other way around.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Niceee!!!
reviews.comment: This is really nice app.. my fav is gps feature... really nice design guys!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
